event.name: LoyaltyMembershipUpdated
event.summary: Tells us when a Loyalty user has signed up or a change of state has occurred

examples.name: example.js

markdown.content:
<Admonition>When firing this event make sure you set the `correlation-id` in the headers. Our schemas have standard metadata make sure you read and follow it.</Admonition>

### Details

The LoyaltyMembershipUpdated (Message Event Type) Event published by Zuora contains information about easyJetPlus Loyalty memberships, profiles names, addresses and update state changes. ðŸŒƒ
